statusDetails.message:
Don't know how to encode {"password":"MEGAdelta06","email":"vikenty.plakhov@testpro.io"} as a byte stream.

Please use EncoderConfig (EncoderConfig#encodeContentTypeAs) to specify how to serialize data for this content-type.
For example: "given().config(RestAssured.config().encoderConfig(encoderConfig().encodeContentTypeAs("alication/json", ContentType.TEXT))). .."
